item.description:
Positive Thinking does not happen over night. It is a process. Using tools for the journey is perfectly acceptable. We will be looking at vizualization and each persons next step in thier own work.

Please bring your thoughs to share and your questions for the asking.

I look forward to meeting each of you and watching our group grow into the 1000s. We are not only in the wave of the future, we are creating it!!

See you there.
Sincerely,
Barb

There will be light refreshments, call for more details.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: The Positive Thinkers League - Keys to Visualization
